{
  "frontend/src/App.tsx": "Main app component that manages session state including participantId and conditionally renders LandingPage or ChatPage based on active session stored in sessionStorage.",
  "frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx": "Two-column landing page with Create/Join session forms; Create Session shows \"Code generated\" label with copy button, \"Session created\" confirmation, and explicit \"Join session\" button before entering chat; footer attribution updated to \"by echu ❤️\" with heart icon removed between \"with\" and \"using\".",
  "frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx": "Full chat interface with message list, attachment support (images/files with preview and download using proper Uint8Array conversion), clickable URL links, video call URL setting/display, and participant sidebar.",
  "frontend/src/components/chat/ParticipantList.tsx": "Displays list of session participants with online status and typing indicators, using participantId for \"(you)\" marker and identity comparison.",
  "frontend/src/components/chat/TypingDots.tsx": "Animated three-dot typing indicator component using Tailwind CSS animations.",
  "frontend/src/components/actions/CopyCodeButton.tsx": "Button component that copies session code to clipboard with visual feedback and fallback for older browsers.",
  "frontend/src/components/feedback/InlineError.tsx": "Reusable error message component with icon and destructive styling for form and operation errors.",
  "frontend/src/hooks/useSessionPolling.ts": "Custom React Query hook that polls session data every 2 seconds, provides sendMessage with attachment support, and setVideoCallUrl functionality.",
  "frontend/src/hooks/useTypingSignal.ts": "Hook that throttles typing indicator signals to backend using participantId and auto-clears after inactivity timeout.",
  "frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts": "Utility functions for persisting session data (code, displayName, participantId) and generating/retrieving a stable per-browser participantId for anonymous users.",
  "frontend/src/lib/time.ts": "Timestamp formatting utility that converts bigint nanoseconds to readable time strings with today/date logic.",
  "frontend/src/index.css": "Global styles with vibrant OKLCH color system featuring coral-orange primary, teal secondary, and amber accent colors for both light and dark modes.",
  "frontend/tailwind.config.js": "Tailwind configuration with custom color tokens, Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, and extended animation utilities.",
  "frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": "Placeholder file for React Query hooks (actual query logic is in useSessionPolling).",
  "frontend/src/components/chat/AttachmentComposer.tsx": "Reusable chat input composer with attachment picker, pre-send preview (image thumbnails or file info), remove control, and send functionality for both text and files.",
  "frontend/src/lib/attachments.ts": "Attachment utilities including file-to-Uint8Array conversion, MIME type helpers, blob URL creation with proper type conversion for compatibility, file size formatting, and max size constant.",
  "frontend/src/lib/linkify.tsx": "Utility that converts message text into React nodes with http(s) URLs rendered as safe clickable links while preserving normal text."
